Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Kimball/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Pulaski, Peterson and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, Bryn Mawr, Pulaski, Peterson and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Bryn Mawr.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #85 Central Temporary Southbound Reroute near Central/Belmont
ShortDescription: Southbound 85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Central: due to, street blockage near Central/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #85 Central buses are temporarily rerouted via Central, Belmont, Austin, Diversey and Central: due to, street blockage near Central/Belmont.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
